title: While We Watched - Documentary on former NDTV journalist Ravish Kumar
selftext:
While We Watched has been described as a depiction of a newsroom in crisis, in which TV journalist Ravish Kumar battles a barrage of fake news, falling ratings and the resulting cutbacks while struggling to maintain fact-based analyses. It was released in cinemas in the UK on 14 July 2023 and aired on TV in the US on 4 September 2023. Now it is available to stream for Americans on the [PBS website](https://www.pbs.org/pov/films/whilewewatched/).

It can be downloaded from here:

https://wetransfer.com/downloads/f1e0a579a821d872b179dc92dec2979820230917012147/8f3e8c

Ravish Kumar and Vinay Shukla (director of While We Watched) have been interviewed by [The Guardian](https://www.theguardian.com/media/2023/jul/02/journalist-ravish-kumar-india-while-we-watched-modi) and [The Week](https://www.theweek.in/leisure/society/2022/09/20/there-is-no-one-saviour-of-journalism-while-we-watched-director-vinay-shukla.html).
comments: It has also been uploaded on YouTube, not officially though afaik.
